title.rendered: Browsing and finding rooms for rent

content.rendered:
Need help finding the perfect place? No worries!

Web

  • Login to your account from our homepage by clicking Log In in the top right-hand corner
  • Click  Rooms for rent from the menu in the top left-hand corner
  • You can type a street, city, or area in the search bar to bring up any listings that are currently available. You can also set filters such as neighborhood, move-in date, duration, budget, and more. Click More Filters under the search bar to add any additional filters and then click Apply Filters.

Mobile Apps

Tap Rooms in the bottom left corner of the dashboard and start browsing

  • Use the filters on the top right to narrow your search even further. Select filters and tap Apply.
  • Use the map view to browse.
